SEARCH
Package org.jboss.elemento.intl

Interface DurationFormatOptions

@JsType(isNative=true, namespace="<global>") public interface DurationFormatOptions
Mapping for duration format options passed to DurationFormat constructors.

In addition to the actual mappings, this class implements the builder pattern using enums to create the options easily and in a type-safe manner. Some enums are shared with other format option builders of the Intl module and may contain more values than intended for the given method. In that case the allowed values are listed on the method. In all other cases all enum values are applicable. 

var duration = Duration.duration()
        .hours(1)
        .minutes(46)
        .seconds(40);

// With style set to "long" and locale "fr-FR"
durationFormat("fr-FR", durationFormatOptions().style(long_)).format(duration);
// "1 heure, 46 minutes et 40 secondes"

// With style set to "short" and locale "en"
durationFormat("en", durationFormatOptions().style(short_)).format(duration);
// "1 hr, 46 min and 40 sec"

// With style set to "narrow" and locale "pt"
durationFormat("pt", durationFormatOptions().style(narrow)).format(duration);
// "1 h 46 min 40 s"
See Also:
  • https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/DurationFormat/DurationFormat#options

    • days

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions days(Format days)
      Allowed values: Format.long_, Format.short_, Format.narrow.

    • daysDisplay

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions daysDisplay(When daysDisplay)
      Allowed values: When.always, When.auto.

    • fractionDigits

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions fractionDigits(int fractionDigits)
      Number of how many fractional second digits to display in the output. Possible values are from 0 to 9.

    • hours

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions hours(Format hours)
      Allowed values: Format.long_, Format.short_, Format.narrow, Format.numeric, Format._2digit.

    • hoursDisplay

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions hoursDisplay(When hoursDisplay)
      Allowed values: When.always, When.auto.

    • localeMatcher

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions localeMatcher(Matcher localeMatcher)
      Allowed values: Matcher.lookup, Matcher.bestFit.

    • microSeconds

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions microSeconds(Format microSeconds)
      If milliSeconds(Format) is Format.numeric or Format._2digit, the only possible value is Format.numeric; the default is Format.numeric. Otherwise, possible values are Format.long_, Format.short_, Format.narrow, Format.numeric.

    • microSecondsDisplay

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions microSecondsDisplay(When microSecondsDisplay)
      Allowed values: When.always, When.auto.

    • milliSeconds

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions milliSeconds(Format milliSeconds)
      If seconds(Format) is Format.numeric or Format._2digit, the only possible value is Format.numeric; the default is Format.numeric. Otherwise, possible values are Format.long_, Format.short_, Format.narrow, Format.numeric.

    • milliSecondsDisplay

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions milliSecondsDisplay(When milliSecondsDisplay)
      Allowed values: When.always, When.auto.

    • minutes

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions minutes(Format minutes)
      If hours(Format) is Format.numeric or Format._2digit, possible values are Format.numeric and Format._2digit, and Format.numeric is normalized to Format._2digit; the default is Format.numeric. Otherwise, possible values are Format.long_, Format.short_, Format.narrow, Format.numeric, and Format._2digit.

    • minutesDisplay

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions minutesDisplay(When minutesDisplay)
      Allowed values: When.always, When.auto.

    • months

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions months(Format months)
      Allowed values: Format.long_, Format.short_, Format.narrow.

    • monthsDisplay

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions monthsDisplay(When monthsDisplay)
      Allowed values: When.always, When.auto.

    • nanoSeconds

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions nanoSeconds(Format nanoSeconds)
      If microSeconds(Format) is Format.numeric or Format._2digit, the only possible value is Format.numeric; the default is Format.numeric. Otherwise, possible values are Format.long_, Format.short_, Format.narrow, Format.numeric.

    • nanoSecondsDisplay

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions nanoSecondsDisplay(When nanoSecondsDisplay)
      Allowed values: When.always, When.auto.

    • numberingSystem

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions numberingSystem(NumberingSystem numberingSystem)
      The numbering system to use for number formatting, such as "arab", "hans", "mathsans", and so on. For a list of supported numbering system types, see Intl.supportedValuesOf(Category).

    • seconds

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions seconds(Format seconds)
      If minutes(Format) is Format.numeric or Format._2digit, possible values are Format.numeric and Format._2digit, and Format.numeric is normalized to Format._2digit; the default is Format.numeric. Otherwise, possible values are Format.long_, Format.short_, Format.narrow, Format.numeric, and Format._2digit.

    • secondsDisplay

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions secondsDisplay(When secondsDisplay)
      Allowed values: When.always, When.auto.

    • style

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions style(Format style)
      Allowed values: Format.long_, Format.short_, Format.narrow, Format.digital.

      @JsOverlay default DurationFormatOptions weeks(Format weeks)
      Allowed values: Format.long_, Format.short_, Format.narrow.

      Allowed values: When.always, When.auto.
